label.title: Title
label.description: The task's title, usually a question or a directive.

description.title: Description
description.description: A more detailed explanation of the task.

required.title: Required
required.description: Is this task required? If so, the status of the parent media cannot be closed until the task is resolved.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of response needed for this task, among the given choices.

options.title: Options
options.description: For single and multiple choice tasks, specify the available values here.

mapping.title: Mapping
mapping.description: To pre-populate a response with the contents of a given media's JSON-LD metadata, enter the mapping rule here.

type.title: Data type
type.description: The type of data that is expected in the matched JSON-LD entry, among the given choices.

match.title: Matching rule
match.description: A JSONPath query that matches one or more entries in the JSON-LD document. You can use this sandbox: http://jsonpath.com to test your queries.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: A text prefix to add to each extracted value.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: The list of projects that will have this task created automatically for every new report. Leave blank to apply to all projects in the current team.
